name: Good Blob
description:
Oh no! Blob has been cursed, to remain a  good monster he must do good things for others. Fortunately, it's Halloween and Blob has plenty of candy! Be nice to kids and give them candy to defeat the curse before the time expires. But be aware: if the kids see you they will run away!

Made by:

- @bluemeansazul
